message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "Using household survey data from the World Bank Living Standard Measurement Study, we examine the determinants of child nutrition outcomes in sub-Saharan Africa.", "dataset": ["World Bank Living Standard Measurement Study"], "topic": ["Nutrition"]}, {"sentence": "In this study, we combine data on crop yields and soil quality from a long-term experiment taking place in Brazil, to estimate the impact of different agricultural practices on productivity.", "dataset": ["long-term experiment data in Brazil"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "This paper analyzes changes in financial inclusion by utilizing data from a nationally representative survey in India, the All-India Debt and Investment Survey (AIDIS).", "dataset": ["All-India Debt and Investment Survey (AIDIS)"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion"]}, {"sentence": "To better understand how energy security can be improved, we analyze three complementary datasets: Global Energy Statistical Yearbook, BP Statistical Review of World Energy, and International Energy Agency databases.", "dataset": ["Global Energy Statistical Yearbook", "BP Statistical Review of World Energy", "International Energy Agency databases"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We use data on institutional quality, trade openness and economic growth from 87 countries over the period 1985-2016 to assess the effects of institutional factors on trade performance.", "dataset": ["data on institutional quality", "data on trade openness", "data on economic growth"], "topic": ["Governance", "Trade"]}, {"sentence": "This research paper employs a novel dataset of firm-level household donations in Tanzania to investigate whether corporate social responsibility activities enhance firm performance.", "dataset": ["firm-level household donations in Tanzania"], "topic": ["Corporate Social Responsibility"]}, {"sentence": "In order to evaluate the effectiveness of public-private partnerships in China's transport sector, we compile data from various sources, including surveys of private investors by the International Finance Corporation (IFC) and China's Ministry of Transport database.", "dataset": ["surveys of private investors by the International Finance Corporation (IFC)", "China's Ministry of Transport database"], "topic": ["Public-Private Partnerships", "Transport"]}, {"sentence": "We assemble several complementary datasets on extreme weather events, such as hurricanes, tornadoes, lightning strikes, droughts, wild fires, and hail storms, to estimate their impact on insurance premiums and payouts in the United States.", "dataset": ["complementary datasets on extreme weather events"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management", "Insurance"]}, {"sentence": "This article explores the link between climate change and food insecurity in Africa using various datasets such as FAO Statistics and NASA's Earth Observing System Data and Information System.", "dataset": ["FAO Statistics", "NASA's Earth Observing System Data and Information System"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "By combining satellite data on water usage, the Global Human Settlement Layer, and municipal government financial data, we analyze the economic value of water used for urban agriculture in Kenya.", "dataset": ["satellite data on water usage", "Global Human Settlement Layer", "municipal government financial data"], "topic": ["Urban Development", "Agriculture and Food"]} ]

content: [{"sentence": "Using household survey data from the World Bank Living Standard Measurement Study, we examine the determinants of child nutrition outcomes in sub-Saharan Africa.", "dataset": ["World Bank Living Standard Measurement Study"], "topic": ["Nutrition"]}, {"sentence": "In this study, we combine data on crop yields and soil quality from a long-term experiment taking place in Brazil, to estimate the impact of different agricultural practices on productivity.", "dataset": ["long-term experiment data in Brazil"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "This paper analyzes changes in financial inclusion by utilizing data from a nationally representative survey in India, the All-India Debt and Investment Survey (AIDIS).", "dataset": ["All-India Debt and Investment Survey (AIDIS)"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion"]}, {"sentence": "To better understand how energy security can be improved, we analyze three complementary datasets: Global Energy "International Energy Agency databases"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We use data on institutional quality, trade openness and economic growth from 87 countries over the period 1985-2016 to assess the effects of institutional factors on trade performance.", "dataset": ["data on institutional quality", "data on trade openness", "data on economic growth"], "topic": ["Governance", "Trade"]}, {"sentence": "This research paper employs a novel dataset of firm-level household donations in Tanzania to investigate whether corporate social responsibility activities enhance firm performance.", "dataset": ["firm-level household donations in Tanzania"], "topic": ["Corporate Social Responsibility"]}, {"sentence": "In order to evaluate the effectiveness of public-private partnerships in China's transport sector, we compile data from various sources, including surveys of private investors by the International Finance Corporation (IFC) and China's Ministry of Transport database.", "dataset": ["surveys of private investors by the International Finance Corporation (IFC)", "China's Ministry of Transport database"], "topic": ["Public-Private Partnerships", "Transport"]}, {"sentence": "We assemble several complementary datasets on extreme weather events, such as hurricanes, tornadoes, lightning strikes, droughts, wild fires, and hail storms, to estimate their impact on insurance premiums and payouts in the United States.", "dataset": ["complementary datasets on extreme weather events"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management", "Insurance"]}, {"sentence": "This article explores the link between climate change and food insecurity in Africa using various datasets such as FAO Statistics and NASA's Earth Observing System Data and Information System.", "dataset": ["FAO Statistics", "NASA's Earth Observing System Data and Information System"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "By combining satellite data on water usage, the Global Human Settlement Layer, and municipal government financial data, we analyze the economic value of water used for urban agriculture in Kenya.", "dataset": ["satellite data on water usage", "Global Human Settlement Layer", "municipal government financial data"], "topic": ["Urban Development", "Agriculture and Food"]} ]
